# The `ExtraFunctionPassManager` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A pass manager to run a set of extra function passes if the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/shouldrunextrapasses">ShouldRunExtraPasses</a> marker analysis is present. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A pass manager to run a set of extra function passes if the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/shouldrunextrapasses">ShouldRunExtraPasses</a> marker analysis is present.

This allows passes to request additional transformations on demand. An example is extra simplifications after loop-vectorization, if runtime checks have been added.

Definition at line 58 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/extrapassmanager-h">ExtraPassManager.h</a>.
